channel.title: [NFSW] Opinions of life [NFSW]
channel.description:
okay most of you may know it, but I was thinking about the basic thing we must do in life and what we're disgned to do.
My opinion on life:
Male Gender: Used to reproduce, earn a living and do for his female companion. Female Gender: Used to "cook" the infant, and raise the child.
Discuss your opinions on life.
There is a reason why I put nfsw tags in the title, it's because 18+ content could occur.
Anyways post away.

item.title: [NFSW] Opinions of life [NFSW]
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

[quote=“tyb97, post:14, topic:424713”]Ill put this into a way all of us can understand,

private boolean hasLife;

public void determine() {
    if (!hasLife) {
        System.out.println("Guess ill get on mopar..");
    } else {
        System.out.println("I have a life, what am I doing on this site?");
    }
}

Thats the way it works… the sad part is, hasLife = false; All the time…[/quote]
100 errors?

All I know is my purpose is to go on moparscape and play runescape and play halo until times end <3

Read full topic

item.title: [NFSW] Opinions of life [NFSW]
item.dc:creator: @judostar1 judostar1
item.description:
@judostar1 wrote:

[quote=“RandQm, post:38, topic:424713”][quote author=Andrew Ferguson link=topic=527375.msg3844410#msg3844410 date=1323500623]
There is no point or reason for life, we are just luck as hell that our galaxy had the right combination of gasses to forum the elements we thrived on then and still do now.
[/quote]
what you call luck…[/quote]

^^^

Read full topic

item.title: [NFSW] Opinions of life [NFSW]
item.dc:creator: @The_Outsider The Outsider
item.description:
@The_Outsider wrote:

Opinion: life should be enjoyed. Doesn’t mean you have to go sky diving every day, if you enjoy posting on Mopar and developing private servers then so be it.

Everyone should be equal. I’m no tree hugging hippy, but we should love more than we hate (within reason, no need to be all gay about it).

Read full topic

item.title: [NFSW] Opinions of life [NFSW]
item.dc:creator: @judostar1 judostar1
item.description:
@judostar1 wrote:

[quote=“Stupit, post:22, topic:424713”]The meaning of life is to reproduce. It’s been proven with all living organisms. You live, hit maturity, find a partner, procreate, die.
That’s it.[/quote]

agreed

Read full topic

item.title: [NFSW] Opinions of life [NFSW]
item.dc:creator: @TabbyKiller TabbyKiller
item.description:
@TabbyKiller wrote:

We live it the way we want. Reproduction is a choice so scratch that. Cooking for men is a choice so scratch that. You all have been deceived with this Bible or Science bull shit. We have this life so stop wondering why and just enjoy it.

Read full topic

[quote=“asshole_rule, post:7, topic:424713”][quote author=reyx7 link=topic=527375.msg3844168#msg3844168 date=1323481091]

I feel like this is going to be 1 big troll topic.

I think the point of live is to have fun living…

^ that statement makes me wonder why I’m here on a Friday night instead of out having fun.

nvm i have no friends

I always find I do NOTHING on Friday nights, but always something on Saturday. Oh well.
[/quote]

I think it’s because I’m just to lazy… + I don’t have a car or anything. I can always get a ride from my parents but they always make me come home very early… :/[/quote]
I don’t have a car either my parents make me ride a horse to school

item.title: [NFSW] Opinions of life [NFSW]
item.dc:creator: @judostar1 judostar1
item.description:
@judostar1 wrote:

[quote=“sinisoul, post:17, topic:424713”][quote author=RandQm link=topic=527375.msg3844313#msg3844313 date=1323491744]

Ill put this into a way all of us can understand,

private boolean hasLife;

public void determine() {
    if (!hasLife) {
        System.out.println("Guess ill get on mopar..");
    } else {
        System.out.println("I have a life, what am I doing on this site?");
    }
}

Thats the way it works… the sad part is, hasLife = false; All the time…

private boolean hasLife;

public void determine() {
    if (!onComputer && personName == RandQm) {
        System.out.println("This is the life I enjoy.");
    } else {
        System.out.println("Fuck having a life!");
    }
else if (!onComputer && personName == Other ) {
        System.out.println("Denying that I don't have a life and enjoy it, because people want me to say that.");
}
}

Fixed it for you
[/quote]

Just no.

Ill put this into a way all of us can understand,

private boolean hasLife;

public void determine() {
    if (!hasLife)
        System.out.println("Guess ill get on mopar..");
    else
        System.out.println("I have a life, what am I doing on this site?");
}

Thats the way it works… the sad part is, hasLife = false; All the time…

Bugged me.[/quote]

Read full topic
